name: Kalit
Lore: 'Jawa leader. Seeking to peacefully settle a long standing disagreement with his rival, Wittin. Wants Jabba to mediate their talks.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Tatooine. Your Jawa Siesta is not unique (•), is doubled, deploys free (or for 6 Force from each player) and cumulatively affects your Jawas'' forfeit. While at Audience Chamber or Jawa Camp, all your other Jawas are power +2.',
